title: Unboxing the new HP ENVY 14
author: sponsored
article: The HP ENVY 14 is designed for anyone that wants to create content, and needs a PC that can power creative applications they need whether that be their full time job, side hustle or passion project. In this video, Tefty gets a first hand experience with the light & powerful 14” touchscreen laptop.

It also comes with HP Display Control. This helps with TRUE COLOR accuracy when web browsing, editing photos or watching videos. The new auto color setting will select the best color space automatically based on the application you’re using.
A mobile studio for professionals in a 14” lightweight laptop.
For more information on pricing and availability visit HP.com
